content.text:
5.2.2.3.1 Manufactured-Inactive 
Any functionality enabled by the templates incorporated into the SP is inactive in this state.  Sessions cannot be 
opened to SPs in this state. 
When the Locking SP is in the Manufactured-Inactive state, the Locking SP’s management of the Storage Device's 
locking and media encryption features SHALL be disabled. 
TCG Storage Security Subsystem Class (SSC): Opal
